name: Heavens Protector
description:
Welcome to my game,

Backstory:

The player must place angel units down to defend the gates of heaven from the devils attacking it. To afford to purchase angel units the player must use the prayer angel to collect more prayer points! Can you survive 5 waves? (may be a little difficult)

How To Play:

Left click the angel unit buttons in the bottom left to select a unit to place. Once selected left click anywhere on the screen to place them (they cost prayer points to select/place). To gain more Prayer Points, place prayer angels down and they will automaticall collect more points. Lastly, Left click on patrol flags to change where the patrol angel moves to.

This Game was made for the MiniJam119:Heaven, Limitation: Anything can die

Thank you for checking out my game!

Music By Finn Talisker (all music rights owned by Finn Talisker Music) : https://soundcloud.com/finntalisker
